directions: Combine cabbage, red bell pepper, shallots, ginger, and basil in a large bowl. Whisk mayonnaise, lemon juice, olive oil, wasabi paste, and ground pepper in another bowl; stir into cabbage mixture. Top with pine nuts and sunflower kernels.
ingredients: 1 (1 inch) piece fresh ginger, peeled and minced
freshly ground multi-colored peppercorns to taste
title: Red Cabbage Slaw with a Twist
